results.title: “Get Ready Because Jesus Is Coming Soon” Is Bad Theology
results.summary: Ron Hessel critiques the common Adventist message of 'Get ready because Jesus is coming soon,' arguing it's theologically unsound. He points out the repeated failures of end-time predictions and asserts that focusing solely on preparing for Jesus to avoid hell misses the point of loving God and others, referencing Matthew 24 and 25. He concludes that loving God and His people is the true preparation, aligning with Jesus' teachings.

title: “Get Ready Because Jesus Is Coming Soon” Is Bad Theology
